Text: Althea Thauberger:  In 2008 Thauberger was one of eight artists in the "Exponential Futures" show at the Morris and Helen Belkin Art Gallery, alongside Tim Lee, Alex Morrison, Kevin Schmidt, Corin Sworn, Isabelle Pauwells, Elizabeth Zvonar and Marc Soo.
